title: Jendela Otomatis dengan Sensor Cahaya dan Suhu Berbasis Internet of Things (IoT) Menggunakan ESP8266
description: A window that can open and close automatically based on the temperature in the room and send messages to Telegram based on the window's condition.

title: Monitoring Hidroponik
description: A device that can monitor water levels in hydroponic systems and send messages to Telegram regarding the status of the hydroponic system.
